title: MRPL Notification 2025 - Walk-in interview for 02 Apprentice Posts
description: The Mangalore Refinery And Petrochemicals (MRPL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Graduate Apprentice, Technician Apprentice Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Civil, Electric, and Mechanical Engineering, and Diploma holders can apply for the MRPL Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-i...
